=====================
POI + GOI variants
=====================

lo nanmu poi klama ku'o klama
---
(source_file
  (statement
  (sumti (lo) (sumti_tail (selbri (tanru_unit (word)))) (relative_clause_rc (noi) (subsentence (statement (sumti (word)) (selbri (tanru_unit (word))))) (kuho)))
  (selbri (tanru_unit (word)))))

lo cukta goi mi ge'u klama
---
(source_file
  (statement
  (sumti (lo) (sumti_tail (selbri (tanru_unit (word)))) (relative_clause_rc (goi) (term (sumti (word))) (gehu)))
  (selbri (tanru_unit (word)))))
